title: PumpRules:  DJ Banner - Live from SXSW, Featuring Jax Taylor
description:
We brought our show to South By Southwest to recap "Vanderpump Rules," and just when we thought it was safe to make fun of Jax... he done showed up and JAXED US. Craziness!! But don't let that overshadow a great episode of VPR, which saw the Toms invite James on the annual cast trip, only to have Katie force them to disinvite him two days later. Oops. Thanks to Acast and Patreon for setting up this live show!

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
